title: Dive deeper into Teacher Moments
description: Become a power user and explore even more features for creating and running your simulations.

list.title: Track participant choices for facilitation and debrief
list.description: Rich data dashboards allow facilitators to see participant choices and prepare for debriefing, while complete data downloads support rigorous research on teacher learning.

list.title: Choices matter
list.description: Through scenario branching, create “choose-your-own” adventure scenarios that let participants understand the consequences of their choices.

list.title: AI coaches
list.description: Artificially intelligent coaching agents can listen to participants as they play scenarios and offer dynamic supports to help learners reflect and practice.

list.title: Multiplayer scenarios
list.description: Real-time chat allows for participants to roleplay together as teachers and students.
